data.text: @strawthatbroke @Sandyboots2020 @BorisJohnson @sajidjavid @nadhimzahawi Has your child ever had a cold or flu previously to this? You sound like an absolute clown.

@strawthatbroke @LCWF_TBK @BorisJohnson @sajidjavid @nadhimzahawi biological warfare against your nation’s own children is a punishable offence.

Children DO need airfilters #nadhimzahawi - especially with you in charge
@AndFry6 @strawthatbroke @Leighpowers16 @BorisJohnson @sajidjavid @nadhimzahawi But that's true of a y virus.

@LostinNassau @BorisJohnson @sajidjavid @nadhimzahawi Feel free to use US stats, or Spanish, German, Austrian, French ......

So your assertion that children are more at risk from the vaccine is totally unfounded?

Remember that the MHRA approved its use for children in this age range in December.  

It is safe.

@strawthatbroke @BorisJohnson @sajidjavid @nadhimzahawi We’ve not vaccinated 5-11 year olds in large numbers so there aren’t the stats for U.K. children of that age having an adverse effect to the vaccine is there

@strawthatbroke @BorisJohnson @sajidjavid @nadhimzahawi If it’s 1% then it means that there isn’t a case for 5-11 years olds getting vaccinated with regards the risks to that age group having an adverse effect to the vaccine. You have to weigh up if potentially long term heart inflammation is more serious than long Covid

@LostinNassau @BorisJohnson @sajidjavid @nadhimzahawi Re. My comment on empathy, he describes 1% as low prevalence. That is just a description of what 50,000 children mean to him.

I'd say it's pretty significant.
